title: MOD | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: Returns the remainder of input expr1 divided by input expr2.
Equivalent to the modulo arithmetic operator (e.g. expr1 % expr2).
Returns either an integer or a fixed-point decimal number.

Both expr1 and expr2 must be numeric expressions.
They are not required to be integers.

The following example shows usage of the MOD() function on both integer
and non-integer values:
